backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining product catalog types, access control with admin roles, and CRUD-like state for products, updates, contacts, profiles, and logo.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report containing metadata scaffold.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/docs/custom-domain.md: Guide detailing how to configure a custom domain for the Beemedha IC deployment with DNS and boundary node setup steps.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining fonts, themes, colors, utilities, and honeycomb background assets.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the frontend app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router configuration using TanStack Router with public and admin routes wrapped in AdminRouteGuard.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Component gating admin routes by checking Internet Identity authentication and admin status with login and denial flows.
frontend/src/components/admin/OwnerOnlyR: Route guard restricting access to the contract owner principal, showing login or access-denied screens as needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling authentication state and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandPrimi: Defines styled layout primitives such as Section, Container, BrandCard, BrandBadge, and BrandButton.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with brand info, navigation links, social icons, and a mock newsletter signup form.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Displays the site header with logo, navigation, admin link, login button, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main site layout with header, footer, outlet content, background pattern, and toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsCard.ts: Shows a clickable news/update card with badge, date, title, and message preview.
frontend/src/components/products/PriceDi: Displays product pricing with discount, original price, and size-based styling.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Renders a product card with image, availability badge, description, and price from variants or base price.
frontend/src/components/products/Purchas: Shows a disabled purchase button and alert indicating checkout is not yet available.
frontend/src/components/products/Variant: Allows selecting weight or flavor variants and notifies the parent of the selected variant and price.
frontend/src/config/owner.ts: Defines the owner principal and a helper to check if a given principal matches it.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on authentication state, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an authentication context and provider using Dfinity AuthClient, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useLiveUpdateConfig.t: Returns default refetch settings for live-updating React Query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Sets the document title and meta description when a page loads or updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating products and related backend data using an ICP actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Imports global stylesheet from the parent directory.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the Beemedha About page with story, values, and sustainability info using branded components.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAccessPage: Allows admins to add or remove administrator principals with validation and clipboard copy support.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Provides a dashboard linking to admin sections for managing products, news, and site assets.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLogoPage.t: Enables uploading, previewing, validating, and updating the site logo via backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminNewsPage.t: Page for listing, creating, and deleting product news updates with a dialog form and update-type badges.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin interface for searching, filtering, creating, editing, seeding, and deleting products with variant support.
frontend/src/pages/CertificationsPage.ts: Displays certifications, lab testing details, and quality assurance information for Beemedha.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form with validation and submission handling plus company contact details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, navigation buttons, and trust highlights promoting natural honey.
frontend/src/pages/NewsDetailPage.tsx: Displays details for a specific news update, including metadata, message content, date, and related product info.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Shows a tabbed list of product updates filtered by type, sorted by timestamp with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Presents the site's privacy policy with sections outlining data collection, usage, sharing, and security.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed product information with images, pricing, variant selection, availability badges, and related updates.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Displays products with category tabs, loading states, and last-updated info using multiple product queries.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Renders the site's terms and conditions with sectioned content and page metadata.
frontend/src/utils/assets.ts: Utility to normalize asset URLs by encoding only the filename segment.
frontend/src/utils/logo.ts: Converts backend logo binary data to a browser URL and provides a safe revocation helper.
frontend/src/utils/price.ts: Helpers for formatting INR prices, detecting discounts, and computing display pricing details.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Validates, parses, and formats Dfinity principals with error handling and truncation support.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state and pending feature requests for multi-admin support and safe upgrades.
